titleStmt.title: Description of British Library, Or 2523: Two Karaite polemical works.

notesStmt.note: Damp entry at edges, sometimes affecting a large part of leaf.
Worming, with damages only partly infilled.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msItem.title: ῾Al ha-aviv ve-nos᾿im aherim על האביב ונושאים אחרים

layoutDesc.layout: Columns: 1; ruled lines: 25 26; written lines: 25 26; Uniform layout. Visible hard point ruling. Some additional notes in margin.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Oriental square script of the 14th century.

binding.p: BM in-house. Spine: 'Karaite Tracts. Arabic. Brit. Mus. Oriental 2523.'

history.provenance: Acquisition: Moses WIlhelm Shapira: (b. 1830, d. 1884), a antiquities dealer of Jerusalem: purchased by the British Museum from him on 08 July 1882: inscribed, folio [89v] (fse001v).
